```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(polite)

url <- "https://www.amazon.co.uk/s?k=headphones&ref=nb_sb_noss"

session <- bow(url,user_agent = "For Educational Purposes")

amazon <- read_html(url)
```


```{r}
headphones <- scrape(session) %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-text-normal") %>%
  html_text
headphones
headphones22 <- headphones[1:22]
headphones22
```

```{r}
headphones_prices <- scrape(session) %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-price-whole") %>%
  html_text
headphones_prices
```

```{r}

headphones_Ratings <- scrape(session) %>%
  html_nodes("i.a-icon.a-icon-star-small.a-star-small-4.aok-align-bottom") %>%
  html_text
headphones_Ratings
```

```{r}


headphones_noReviews <- scrape(session) %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-size-base.s-underline-text") %>%
  html_text
headphones_noReviews
```
